title: Elementary Science Instructional Design Workshop Utilizing Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Science Curriculum and Instructional Design Fundamentals, with Digital Tool Application Experience
context.additional_context: Practice-focused course for current elementary teachers exploring methods to integrate GenAI tools into actual science classes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the technical characteristics of GenAI (relative advantages, usability) and evaluate its applicability to science instructional design.
Learners can develop GenAI utilization strategies considering environmental factors (social influence, support conditions).
Learners can design specific GenAI usage scenarios (purpose and methods) to support scientific inquiry activities.
Learners can develop an instructional design framework incorporating psychological factors (trust, risk perception) related to GenAI use.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
